zombies.descrip: With high morale and no trace of fatigue, Foot Soldiers consider it an honor to serve in the ongoing siege upon Neighborvilleâ€™s brains.

skins.obtencion: Purchasable from Rux for 800 rainbow stars
skins.extra: The fate of humanity rests in her hands. Hopefully she's not hungry.
Take a guess as to how Corporal Shootypants got his name.

skins.obtencion: Snow Day prize map, cost 10 prize bulbs
skins.extra: Better hope you don't battle him in a place with a lot of cows! The Cow Store?

skins.obtencion: Purchasable from Rux for 800 rainbow stars
skins.extra: A pioneer in the 'combat diaper' field.
No one can stop the Royal Plaid-Master...from looking so rugged.

skins.obtencion: Purchasable from Rux for 800 rainbow stars
skins.extra: He's been looking forward to the battle for the future since yesterday.
The only thing he stole...was our hearts. To be fair, he was aiming for our brains.

skins.obtencion: Purchasable from Rux for 550 rainbow stars
skins.extra: He once tried to jump over a beehive. It didn't go well.

sets.obtencion: Purchasable from Rux for 600 rainbow stars
sets.extra: This set has a description: He knows seventeen ways to tie a knot and eat it.

sets.obtencion: Opening golden chests in zombie Town Center
sets.extra: This set is used by Elusive Foe Pack Rat (with the Captain Shootypants costume)

sets.obtencion: Purchasing four individual parts from Otto Do in Weirding Woods for a total of 500 marshmallows
Fall Festival prize map, 28 prize bulbs total
